introText: Data gaps exist due to limited public metrics; several figures are proxy-based and flagged ⚠ where estimated or supported by sparse evidence.

confidenceLevels.label: Estimated / Uncertain
confidenceLevels.description: Values inferred from context or partial/indirect data (e.g., SteamSpy owner ranges post-2018 privacy changes, language of reviews, platform popularity) and should be interpreted cautiously.

limitations.title: Missing concrete player metrics
limitations.description: Exact sales figures and detailed demographics are not publicly available; analysis relies on proxies such as Steam review counts, chart positions, and anecdotal evidence.

limitations.title: SteamSpy accuracy constraints
limitations.description: SteamSpy owner ranges provide only ballpark estimates and are less reliable after 2018 privacy changes.

limitations.title: No official regional/platform breakdowns
limitations.description: Sales by region or platform are not officially disclosed; any breakdowns mentioned are inferred from contextual signals.

limitations.title: Opaque/ephemeral social metrics
limitations.description: Newer platform engagement metrics (e.g., TikTok views, Discord membership) are partially hidden or transient; Discord does not openly show member counts beyond certain limits.

limitations.title: Potentially outdated third‑party figures
limitations.description: Example: the 333 figure for r/TheChineseRoom was sourced from a third party and may be slightly outdated.

limitations.title: Search/platform visibility limits
limitations.description: Some steps (e.g., viewing historical Reddit threads) were impeded, reducing completeness of verification.

metadata.method: Relied on proxy indicators including Steam review counts, chart positions, anecdotal evidence, and SteamSpy owner ranges; inferred regional/platform signals from review language and platform popularity; reviewed partially hidden/ephemeral social metrics (TikTok, Discord).
metadata.note: Uncertain figures were flagged with ⚠ to denote estimation or sparse evidence; source text appears truncated.

closingText: Interpret quantitative mentions as indicative estimates rather than precise counts, and apply caution when comparing across platforms or regions.
